page.title: 03MANOR FARM, CHELTENHAM
page.content: Up Chargrove Lane there are about three or four farms.Chargrove Lane is in Up Hatherley and Chargrove Lane goes onto the Shurdington Road.If you turn left the road goes up to Warden Hill,but now we are going to tell you about Manor Farm.Manor Farm is the first farm that you go past when you go up Chargrove Lane.The farm house was built about 220 years ago.The farm has a lot of fields with it and in one of them they are doing an interesting archaeological dig which they think it might be an old Saxon church.There is a building company who are hoping to build some houses in some of the fields.Already pipes are being put through some fields for draining the rain water from out of the ground.In one of the fields there are a lot of Oak trees.The Newman family have owned Manor Farm for many generations.
